tool.name: CpptrajRandomizeIons
tool.description: : Wrapper of the AmberTools (AMBER MD Package) cpptraj tool module.

param.name: outname_output_pdb_path
param.label: output PDB name
param.help: Structure PDB file with randomized ions Format: [output].pdb

param.name: outname_output_crd_path
param.label: output CRD,MDCRD,INPCRD name
param.help: Structure CRD file with coordinates including randomized ions Format: [output].[format]

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: ion_mask
param.label: ion_mask
param.help: Ions to be randomized. Cpptraj mask syntax can be found at the official Cpptraj manual.

param.name: solute_mask
param.label: solute_mask
param.help: Solute (or set of atoms) around which the ions can get no closer than the distance specified. Cpptraj mask syntax can be found at the official Cpptraj manual.

param.name: distance
param.label: distance
param.help: Minimum distance cutoff for the ions around the defined solute.

param.name: binary_path
param.label: binary_path
param.help: Path to the cpptraj executable binary.
